item.title: Readings shared September 5, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Mastodon on September 5, 2024 are

  • Readings shared September 4, 2024. #ITP #Lean4 #IsabelleHOL #Math #Calculemus #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Proofs of "0+1+2+3+···+n=n(n + 1)/2" in Lean4 and Isabelle/HOL. #ITP #Lean4 #IsabelleHOL #Math #Calculemus
  • Lean: First steps (07 - Proof by cases). ~ Tariq Rashid (@rzeta0@mastodon.social). #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • Logic and proof. ~ Jeremy Avigad, Robert Y. Lewis & Floris van Doorn. #ITP #LeanProver #Lean4 #Logic #Math
  • Formalising inductive and coinductive containers. ~ Stefania Damato, Thorsten Altenkirch & Axel Ljungström.3# #ITP #Agda
  • Sized types and coinduction in Safe Agda. ~ Isaac Elliott. #Agda #FunctionalProgramming
  • OCaml scientific computing. #OCaml #FunctionalProgramming #AI
  • LSP: the good, the bad, and the ugly. ~ Michael Peyton Jones (@mpeytonjones). #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Parsers are relative bimonads. ~ Artemis. #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming

item.title: Lecturas compartidas el 2 de agosto de 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
Las lecturas compartidas en Mastodon el 2 de agosto de 2024 son

  • Lecturas compartidas el 1 de agosto de 2024. #ITP #Lean4 #Mathlib #Coq #Math #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Semialgebraic groups and generalized affine buildings. ~ Raphael Appenzeller. #PhDThesis #ITP #LeanProver #Math
  • Lie groups and algebras (in Isabelle/HOL). ~ Richard Schmoetten & Jacques D. Fleuriot. #ITP #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • Semantical analysis of intuitionistic modal logics between CK and IK. ~ Jim de Groot, Ian Shillito & Ranald Clouston. #ITP #Coq #Logic
  • Computer-assisted proofs for Lyapunov stability via sums of squares certificates and constructive analysis. ~ Grigory Devadze, Victor Magron & Stefan Streif. #ITP #MinLog #Math
  • A framework for semiring-annotated type systems. ~ James Wood. #ITP #Agda #TypeTheory
  • Where does the name "algebraic data type" come from? ~ Li-yao Xia (@lysxia). #FunctionalProgramming #Hope #Miranda
  • Analyzing Haskell stability. ~ Jappie Klooster (@jappieklooster). #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Data.Maybe, and thoughts on library design. ~ Srijan Paul (@injuly). #Haskell #FunctionalProgramming
  • Esta vez sí: Con la IA, nada será igual en la Universidad. ~ Mariano Fernández Enguita. #IA #Educación
  • La demanda de educación superior ante el cambio tecnológico y la inteligencia artificial. ~ José Ignacio Conde-Ruiz, Juan José Ganuza, Manu García y Carlos Victoria. #IA #Educación
  • Inteligencia Artificial y capital humano: ¿Pueden estar en peligro sus complementariedades? ~ Juan F. Jimeno y Ana Lamo. #IA

item.title: Lecturas compartidas el 13 de julio de 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
Las lecturas compartidas en Mastodon el 14 de julio de 2024 son

  • Lecturas compartidas el 12 de julio de 2024. #ITP #Coq #Logic #Math #FunctionalProgramming #Haskell #Physics
  • IMO 1987 Problem 4: Animated Lean 4 proof. ~ David Renshaw. #ITP #Lean4 #Math #IMO
  • Formalization of the filter extension principle (FEP) in Coq. ~ Guowei Dou, Wensheng Yu. #ITP #Coq #Logic #Math
  • Binding contexts as partitionable multisets in Abella. ~ Terrance Gray, Gopalan Nadathur. #ITP #Abella
  • Domain theory in univalent foundations I: Directed complete posets and Scott's D∞. ~ Tom de Jong. #ITP #Agda
  • Domain theory in univalent foundations II: Continuous and algebraic domains. ~ Tom de Jong, Martín Hötzel Escardó. #ITP #Agda
  • Separable polynomials and separable extensions. ~ Christoph Schwarzweller. #ITP #Mizar #Math
  • Integral of continuous three variable functions. ~ Noboru Endou. #ITP #Mizar #Math
  • Competitive programming in Haskell: Tree path decomposition, part I. ~ Brent Yorgey (@byorgey@mathstodon.xyz). #FunctionalProgramming #Haskell

item.title: Lecturas compartidas el 10 de julio de 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
Las lecturas compartidas en Mastodon el 10 de julio de 2024 son

  • Lecturas compartidas el 9 de julio de 2024. #ITP #Lean4 #IsabelleHOL #Logic #Math
  • #Calculemus: Demostraciones con Lean4 e Isabelle/HOL de "Relación entre los índices de las subsucesiones y de la sucesión". #ITP #Lean4 #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • On non-triviality of the hierarchy of decreasing Church-Rosser abstract rewriting systems. ~ Ievgen Ivanov. #ITP #IsabelleHOL
  • Formalization of the filter extension principle (FEP) in Coq. ~ Guowei Dou, Wensheng Yu. #ITP #Coq
  • Binding contexts as partitionable multisets in Abella. ~ Terrance Gray, Gopalan Nadathur. #ITP #Abella
  • A Beluga formalization of the Harmony Lemma in the π-calculus. ~ Gabriele Cecilia, Alberto Momigliano. #ITP #Beluga
  • Confluence by the Z-property for De Bruijn’s λ-calculus with nameless dummies, based on PLFA∗. ~ Vincent van Oostrom. #ITP #Agda
  • Verifying peephole rewriting in SSA compiler IRs. ~ Siddharth Bhat, Alex Keizer, Chris Hughes, Andrés Goens, Tobias Grosser. #ITP #Lean4
  • Moca 0.3: A first-order theorem prover for Horn clauses. ~ Yusuke Oi, Nao Hirokawa, Teppei Saito. #Haskell #ATP #Logic
